title: Nile AI
description:
NILE

THE PREFERRED DIARY APP OF THE EPILEPSY FOUNDATION
Have you been diagnosed with epilepsy and don’t know where to start? Have multiple medications still not kept you seizure free? Finding the right treatment takes many steps. Nile was built to empower you on that journey.

HEALTH TRACKER
Track your side effects, auras and seizures with a few clicks. Keeping track of your daily health just got easier. With Nile you can also log your seizure free days to remember your progress. Click, log, and get back to living.

LEARN FROM YOUR DATA
See the progress you’ve made over time.
Gain insight about your triggers.

STAY ON TRACK WITH YOUR MEDICATION
Add your medication and set customized reminders for each one.

TRUSTED MEDICAL INFORMATION
Get the latest in epilepsy education. Nile suggests helpful medical content specific to your needs. Access our library of trusted tips for living your best life with epilepsy.

Has your doctor invited you to use Nile?

If you received an invitation to download Nile through your healthcare team, Nile can help you stay connected with your doctor between visits.


MEDICATION TITRATION
View and track the medication your doctor prescribed to you. You’ll get notified when your medication regimen has been entered or updated.


SHARE YOUR HEALTH JOURNEY
Have less anxiety about how to prepare for your next doctor’s appointment. It can be hard to remember all events. With Nile your doctor can access the triggers, events, side effects, and seizures you logged since the last appointment.

Visit www.nile.ai to learn more.

Disclaimer: Nile is a communication tool that helps users keep track of and manage their condition. Where available, it also connects patients with their healthcare providers, giving them easier access to the treatment plans prescribed by their doctors. The app itself does not provide medical advice or treatment plans. Always consult a medical professional for advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

Customer Support:
818-208-5975
support@nile.ai

Privacy Policy - https://www.nile.ai/privacy/
